article: Many people say that they have seen flying saucers in the sky.  _  can these things be ? Some people think that they are spaceships from other planets. Doctors  _  that perhaps they are only a weakness of the eyes. It is possible that they are our own planes  _  very high. Or are they birds with the sun's light on them? But some people say that they have seen them  _  . They have seen beings get off them and walk around. They have  _  to those beings, sometimes in English. People have  _  photos of flying saucers and of these beings. We have seen the photos, but sometimes the people had to take them in a  _  . Children have seen flying saucers, and even dogs have seen them. Perhaps we do not think that the  _  of children, or dogs are important. But school-teachers have  _  seen them and Air Force officers and  _  policemen. Must we not listen to these people?
